87 // Class template stMetricTree
88 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
103 template <class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
104 class stMetricTree: public stMetricAccessMethod < ObjectType, EvaluatorType >{
105  public:
109  typedef ObjectType tObject;
110 
115  typedef EvaluatorType tMetricEvaluator;
116 
120  typedef stResult <ObjectType> tResult;
121 
130  stMetricTree(stPageManager * pageman):
131  stMetricAccessMethod < ObjectType, EvaluatorType >(NULL){
132 
133  // Common to all Metric trees
134  myPageManager = pageman;
135  this->myMetricEvaluator = new tMetricEvaluator();
136  sharedMetricEvaluator = false; // Not shared
137  }//end stMetricTree
138 
149  stMetricTree(stPageManager * pageman, EvaluatorType * metricEval):
150  stMetricAccessMethod < ObjectType, EvaluatorType >(metricEval){
151 
152  // Common to all Metric trees
153  myPageManager = pageman;
154  sharedMetricEvaluator = true; // Shared
155  }//end stMetricTree
156 
161  virtual ~stMetricTree(){
162 
163  if (!sharedMetricEvaluator){
164  delete this->myMetricEvaluator;
165  }//end if
166  }//end stMetricTree
167 
171  stPageManager * GetPageManager(){
172  return myPageManager;
173  }//end GetPageManager
174 
179  virtual double GetMinOccupation(){
180  return -1;
181  }//end GetMinOccupation
182 
187  virtual stCount GetMaxOccupation(){
188  return 0;
189  }//end GetMaxOccupation
190 
197  virtual stCount GetHeight(){
198  return 0;
199  }//end GetHeight
200 
206  virtual long GetNumberOfObjects(){
207  return -1;
208  }//end GetNumberOfObjects
209 
215  virtual long GetNodeCount(){
216  return -1;
217  }//end GetNodeCount
218 
226  virtual stDistance GetDistanceLimit(){
227  return -1;
228  }//end GetDistanceLimit()
229 
236  virtual stTreeInfoResult * GetTreeInfo(){
237  return NULL;
238  }//end GetTreeInfo
239  protected:
243  stPageManager * myPageManager;
244 
245  private:
250  bool sharedMetricEvaluator;
251 };//end stMetricTree
252 
253 #endif //__STMETRICTREE_H
